claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.
explanation: A flowchart determining influenza vaccine dosing for children based on prior vaccination history. The chart asks if the child received ≥2 doses of trivalent or quadrivalent vaccine before July 1, 2022; if yes, recommend 1 dose of 2022–23 vaccine; if no or unknown, recommend 2 doses of 2022–23 vaccine administered ≥4 weeks apart. The image provides a pediatric influenza vaccine dosing algorithm and does not mention Flublok or microgram amounts of hemagglutinin per strain, so it does not support the claim.
